Hi.

On page foo.bar there are links in javascript like:
onclick="window.open('http://nobelprize.org/nobel_prizes/chemistry/laureates/2006/index.html', 'new_win')"

I'm using the org.archive.crawler.scope.DomainScope scoping model and don't want pages like this to be crawled

Is links like this counted in because of the "max-speculative-hops" and are there any way to avoid them ?

best
